bibo:Webpage.dcterms:title: Can you make AI fairer than a judge? Play our courtroom algorithm game
bibo:Webpage.dcterms:abstract: As a child, you develop a sense of what “fairness” means. It’s a concept that you learn early on as you come to terms with the world around you. Something either feels fair or it doesn’t. But increasingly, algorithms have begun to arbitrate fairness for us. They decide who sees housing ads, who gets hired…
bibo:Webpage.bibo:shortTitle: Can you make AI fairer than a judge?
